name: Sheffield Street Art Showcase
description: I have personally, painstakingly, patrolled the streets of Sheffield to put together this tour, showcasing some of the most impressive and astoundingly beautiful works in the city center.  Along with my excellent company, you'll be treated to information about the artists and the background to the works (if possible - some of these artists are rather elusive!)  Some of the art you will see on the triip can be seen below, but just a fraction of the 30+ works to be seen are included here, such that you can discover it for yourself as we go.
